title: Servers down again?
body: Are the servers really down again, and why can't Riot prevent this from happening so often?

replies.body: Im going to assume its unintentional and will be fixed soon since theres no warning that I know of. Chin up, and in the meantime, look at the pretty pictures of new champs and items  xD
Worst part about it is, my mates are all able to connect, just the odd few can't lol
Yeah i am also with le optus and i cannot connect either
I have confirmed its an Optus problem.  I can't connect on my Optus Cable or Optus Mobile Wi-Fi, but I can connect on my Telstra mobile Wi-Fi.
I'm running on the best plan Optus can provide and im getting this problem...

I'm wondering of this is another Optus Cable problem.  I'm having the problem and I'm on Optus Cable Burwood VIC node.

The error reads:

"Could not connect to the HTTP server. Please check that your Internet
 connection is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking access."
